page.title: 06Traffic patterns
page.content: Most children live at least half a mile from school and have transport to and from school. This is usually parents'cars or a bike. The traffic one the minor roads in our area is usually quite light, 7 were counted in one 10 minute period. In contrast the A1 is much busier with 337 in one 10 minute period. On the country roads you have to slow down because of all the bends, people, rabbits , pheasants and partridge. On the A1 traffic travels much faster because it is a dual carriageway with two lanes of traffic in each direction. You would have to slow down though when a slow lorry is being overtaken by another lorry.
